name: Space-O-Mania
description:
Hey there.

This here is another project of mine that I made as of late. It's a small platformer + shooter game filled with exploration and action. In this game, you crashed into a small planet filled with beautiful plants, but also space rangers. Your goal is to explore and find crystals scattered around the map, without getting killed obviously.

I hope you can enjoy this little game, and give feedback for the future!
